snippet: Trying hard to top their job as hosts last year, Tina Fey and Amy Poehler fell short when aiming to be like the guys. But they were very funny on the subject of women and Hollywood.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley The TV Watch column remarks on outfits and attitudes displayed on telecast of Golden Globe Awards ceremony.
lead_paragraph: Trying hard to top their job as hosts last year, Tina Fey and Amy Poehler fell short when aiming to be like the guys. But they were very funny on the subject of women and Hollywood.

headline.seo: Tina Fey and Amy Poehler Celebrate Gender Equality
headline.main: Blending Genders, for Some Laughs at the Golden Globes
